items.name: SuzieQ
items.description: An open-source, multivendor network observability platform for cloud-first networks.

items.name: Netpicker
items.description: Test the design, security and compliance of your network, A Python-based testing platform for your network

items.name: Batfish
items.description: A network configuration analysis tool that builds a mathematical model of network behavior, allowing for advanced querying and validation.

items.name: anta
items.description: Arista Network Test Automation (ANTA) Framework is a Python framework that automates tests for Arista devices.

items.name: Ondatra
items.description: Ondatra (Open Network Device Automated Test Runner and API) is a framework for writing and running tests against both real and containerized network devices.

items.name: pyATS
items.description: Cisco pyATS is a Network Test and Automation Solution with a closed-source core and open-source extensions. The core framework is available in binary format, while related packages like Unicon plugins are fully open source.

items.name: NUTS
items.description: NUTS (Network Unit Testing System) is a Pytest plugin enabling network testing using YAML files.

items.name: narrowin Lightweight Network Explorer
items.description: Highly intuitive graphical multivendor network observability platform for IT and OT/IoT networks.

items.name: Robot Framework
items.description: Robot Framework is an open-source automation framework for test automation and robotic process automation (RPA). It is supported by the Robot Framework Foundation and widely used in the industry.

items.name: Junos Snapshot Administrator
items.description: Junos Snapshot Administrator enables you to capture and audit runtime environment snapshots of your networked devices running the Junos operating system (Junos OS).
